title: #8- 2 Br/1Bth furnished apt near TX Med Ctr
map_address: 3831 North Braeswood Blvd near Stella Link
app_fee: $60 non refundable. No Fee for students with valid Student ID.
posting_body: ['Just remodeled with new central AC/Heating System, new laminated floor, new stove, new fridge, fresh paint and much more.', 'Furnished two bedroom/one bathroom apartment near Texas Medical Center, Rice University, University of Houston and Houston Downtown.', 'Features queen size beds, full kitchen (new gas stove, microwave, and new full-size refrigerator), full bathroom, sofa/love seat/ coffee table/TV in living room, dining table and chairs, washer/dryer in the same building, covered and uncovered parking, safe neighborhood, close to shopping centers, ball games and entertainment and much more.', 'Apt #8 on the second floor.', 'Biking trail, Parks and the YMCA are within a walking distance.', 'Bus Stop is in our front yard with bus every 10 minutes to Texas Medical Center, Rice University, University of Houston and downtown (save gas, parking, car repairs, ...etc.).', 'Wi-Fi Internet and all utilities (water, gas, and solid waste) are included except electricity.', 'For 12-month lease for up to 2 students or medical residents.', 'For other than students/medical residents or 4 to 8-month lease, the rent is 20% higher.', 'Add $120/month for each additional person or child (maximum 4 people).', 'Deposit is $400 per person.', 'E-mail me for questions.', 'Quite hours between 10:30 pm and 6:30 am.']
